channel.title: Defcon 667
channel.description:
[size=10pt][size=10pt][b][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt]Hello and Welcome to Defcon RSPS[/size][/size][/size][/b][/size][/size]
Forums: www.Defconrsps.com All information for downloading our client will be on the forums! be sure to check us out!
We are a unique server that have active staff members who constantly listen to the communities opinions and continue to do updates as often as possible.
We have good amount of players who are with us on Defcon and each time a new player joins they dont regret coming here as we have made is as fun as possible. we constantly listen to YOU and have had an uptime of around 1 month, we need you to to come join our community and enjoy Defcon, hassle free environment but enjoyable with a friendly community and staff willing to help each and everyone of you.
[size=10pt][b]There is so much to do when you come to this server including:[/b][/size]
[center]New quest which is custom made[/center] [center]Working clue scrolls with rewards when completed[/center] [center]All skills functional so all you skillers can get maxing! ;)[/center] [center]A lot of different bosses including GWD bosses as well as a new boss Lucien being released very very soon![/center] [center]We also have a custom minigame for those of you who enjoy the clan pking :)[/center] [center]We also have a Safe PVP and a non safe PVP for all of you who like to get out there and PK this includes rewards for so many kills[/center] [center]Dungeoneering is fully functional with working xp lamps as well as all the chaotics with the right stats[/center] [center]Custom shops with all your favourite gear in them[/center] [center]We have a unique home one of which you will have never seen as a home in any other RSPS as we aim to be unique[/center]
There is just so much to say about this server, but instead of filling your mind, why not come check this great server out yourself!
You will not regret joining.
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2d1sg1y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/anehoz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2ep1ri1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/33k9hrt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/dm4t1y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/sgh7ip.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2n08xf9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2u5vx50.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/ank4n7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/a42yyc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/24e9v87.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/sea8o7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/euiywk.png[/img]
Thank you for reading.

item.title: Defcon 667
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Never seen before home, will see about that.
Either way some pics would be nice.

EDIT

34 Hp,Att,Str,Def after killing just one Rock crab.
Not really my cup of tea sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Defcon 667
item.dc:creator: @kaosvii kaosvii
item.description:
@kaosvii wrote:

[size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt]Hello and Welcome to Defcon RSPS[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]

Forums: www.Defconrsps.com
All information for downloading our client will be on the forums! be sure to check us out!

We are a unique server that have active staff members who constantly listen to the communities opinions and continue to do updates as often as possible.

We have good amount of players who are with us on Defcon and each time a new player joins they dont regret coming here as we have made is as fun as possible. we constantly listen to YOU and have had an uptime of around 1 month, we need you to to come join our community and enjoy Defcon, hassle free environment but enjoyable with a friendly community and staff willing to help each and everyone of you.

[size=10pt]There is so much to do when you come to this server including:[/size]

[center]New quest which is custom made[/center]
[center]Working clue scrolls with rewards when completed[/center]
[center]All skills functional so all you skillers can get maxing! ;)[/center]
[center]A lot of different bosses including GWD bosses as well as a new boss Lucien being released very very soon![/center]
[center]We also have a custom minigame for those of you who enjoy the clan pking :)[/center]
[center]We also have a Safe PVP and a non safe PVP for all of you who like to get out there and PK this includes rewards for so many kills[/center]
[center]Dungeoneering is fully functional with working xp lamps as well as all the chaotics with the right stats[/center]
[center]Custom shops with all your favourite gear in them[/center]
[center]We have a unique home one of which you will have never seen as a home in any other RSPS as we aim to be unique[/center]

There is just so much to say about this server, but instead of filling your mind, why not come check this great server out yourself!

You will not regret joining.













Thank you for reading.
